array: English : fluent (TOEIC: 935/990, several trips to UK, English father)

small_components.title: Hobbies
small_components.content: Theatre  (TTI INSA society), sport, reading, DIY

elements.text: Computer Science engineering diploma, INSA de Lyon Graduate School, Lyon, France (4rd year, Bachelor's level)
Erasmus semester in Denmark at the Via University in Horsens
Technical Degree in computer science, IUT Illkirch, France
Scientific Baccalaureat (High School Diploma), Strasbourg, France
Internship at Axopen, participation in 4 different projects:
list: Bouyers: development of the settings page for a sound level measurement machine with the Angular framework.
Axopen's website: creation of pages for the official Axopen website in PHP/HTML/CSS (Wordpress).
Sport dans la ville (Sport in the town): creation of the registration/modification page for teenagers with the Angular framework.

elements.text: Summer job for the city of Strasbourg
Temporary work at JYSK, Horsens, Denmark
Delivery of the municipal news bulletin for Vendenheim town hall
C#, Java, Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MySql, Materialize (CSS), Bootstrap (CSS), Laravel (PHP), Angular (JS), Adobe Premier Pro, office suite Word
PL/SQL, C, NodeJs, ReactJs, NextJs, Adobe Photoshop, Blender, Unity
Secretary of the INSAlgo society for algorithms.
Participation in development competitions (the Shaker, the Battle Dev)
Participation in several hackathons (“hacking industry camp”, “the night of the info”,”24h of the IUT”)
Creation of my personnal website : www.mathieu-montgomery.ovh (french)
Volunteer in the video editing team for the amateur full length movie “Edhalion” (medieval fantastic movie) produced by Trustwonder.
Volunteer in the organisation team of the annual theque competition  (French baseball) in Brumath, Alsace, welcoming more than 400 young participants (6yrs - 20yrs) over a weekend.
